overview: The film "Nine-faced Monster" is a final showdown with evil and no righteousness, life and death, love and hate, right and evil, black and white, good and evil, real and illusory stories. The new form of expression reinterprets a costumed martial arts movie for the audience. The movie "Nine-faced Monster" is expected to be filmed before the spring, so stay tuned!
title: Nine To Nirvana
